message: Saddle up, boys and girls without mics. Time to let the players know what you think.
First Game Watched: PvZ on Scrap Station - Jake vs Someone
2:30 - There's no way he could be in your base. No need to hold the door with a probe.
2:00 - Idle probe, and failure to build a probe
4:00 - Hold Position to hold a wall, don't make more pylons than you need, build another gateway earlier
After spending an hour and a half doing this, I refresh my page to see it's all gone
I wanted to thank everyone for all the comments. It's a shame Convore is having trouble, but I'm extremely happy to see us helping our teammates regularly.
Sorry about that.  I reported the bug and I guess they haven't had problems like that but they're going to make it more apparent if issues are detected with messages being sent
